mapper.select: SELECT al.account_leder_id, al.increase, al.decrease, al.balance, al.detail, al.write_date, al.comp_id, c.comp_name, al.product_id, p.product_name, al.account_id, a.account_name FROM account_leder al JOIN accounts a ON al.account_id = a.account_id JOIN companys c ON al.comp_id = c.comp_id JOIN products p ON al.product_id = p.product_id
